readme:
# RepeatMasking Workflow

This workflow uses RepeatModeler and RepeatMasker for genome analysis.

- RepeatModeler is a software package for identifying and modeling de novo families of transposable elements (TEs). At the heart of RepeatModeler are three de novo repeat search programs (RECON, RepeatScout and LtrHarvest/Ltr_retriever) which use complementary computational methods to identify repeat element boundaries and family relationships from sequence data.

- RepeatMasker is a program that analyzes DNA sequences for *interleaved repeats* and *low-complexity* DNA sequences. The result of the program is a detailed annotation of the repeats present in the query sequence, as well as a modified version of the query sequence in which all annotated repeats are present.

## Input dataset for RepeatModeler
- RepeatModeler requires a single input file, a genome in fasta format.


## Outputs dataset for RepeatModeler
- Two output files are generated:
    - summary file (.tbl)
    - fasta file containing alignments in order of appearance in the query sequence


## Input dataset for RepeatMasker
- ReapatMasker requires the fasta file generated by RepeatModeler

## Outputs datasets for RepeatMasker
- Five output files are generated:
    - a fasta file
    - .gff3 file
    - a table summarizing the repeated content of the sequence analyzed
    - a file with statistics related to the repeated content of the sequence analyzed
    - a summary of the mutation sites found and the order of grouping
changelog:
# Changelog

## [0.1] - 2023-09-21

Initial version of the RepeatMasking workflow for genomic sequencing data.
diagram_svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1000 420" role="img" aria-label="Repeat masking workflow diagram">
  <title>Repeat Masking with RepeatModeler and RepeatMasker</title>
  <desc>Genome repeat masking pipeline: RepeatModeler identifies de novo repeat families from a genome FASTA, then RepeatMasker uses those consensus sequences to mask repeats, producing masked genome, repeat annotations, and statistics</desc>

  <defs>
    <pattern id="grid" width="20" height="20" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <path d="M 20 0 L 0 0 0 20" fill="none" stroke="#c5d5e4" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    <pattern id="grid-major" width="100" height="100" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="url(#grid)"/>
      <path d="M 100 0 L 0 0 0 100" fill="none" stroke="#b0c4d8" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    <style>
      .connection { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 4; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .connection-qc { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 5 3; }
      .connection-secondary { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .node-card { filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)); }
    </style>
  </defs>

  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="1000" height="420" fill="#f8f9fa"/>
  <rect width="1000" height="420" fill="url(#grid-major)"/>

  <!-- Title bar -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="1000" height="45" fill="#25537b"/>
  <text x="20" y="28" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="16" font-weight="600" fill="white">Repeat Masking</text>
  <text x="178" y="28" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="12" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">RepeatModeler + RepeatMasker Pipeline</text>

  <!-- ==================== CONNECTIONS ==================== -->

  <!-- Genome FASTA → RepeatModeler -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 200 155 C 250 155, 260 155, 300 155"/>

  <!-- RepeatModeler → RepeatMasker -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 500 155 C 550 155, 560 155, 600 155"/>

  <!-- RepeatModeler → Consensus Sequences output -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 400 210 C 400 250, 200 270, 200 310"/>

  <!-- RepeatModeler → Seeds output -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 400 210 C 400 260, 370 280, 370 310"/>

  <!-- RepeatMasker → Masked Genome output -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 700 210 C 700 260, 560 280, 560 310"/>

  <!-- RepeatMasker → Repeat Annotation output -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 720 210 C 720 260, 700 280, 700 310"/>

  <!-- RepeatMasker → Repeat Statistics output -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 740 210 C 740 260, 840 280, 840 310"/>

  <!-- ==================== NODES ==================== -->

  <!-- NODE: Genome FASTA (Input - Gold) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(20, 110)">
    <rect width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="180" height="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(44,49,67,0.6)">1:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143">Genome FASTA</text>
    <text x="90" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Genome assembly</text>
    <text x="90" y="72" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Input sequence to mask</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- NODE: RepeatModeler (Processing - Blue) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(300, 110)">
    <rect width="200" height="100" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="200" height="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">2:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="700" fill="white">RepeatModeler</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">De novo repeat discovery</text>
    <text x="100" y="72" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Build repeat library</text>
    <line x1="10" y1="82" x2="190" y2="82" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="2 2"/>
    <text x="100" y="95" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057">Consensus seqs + seed alignments</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="100" cy="100" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  </g>

  <!-- NODE: RepeatMasker (Processing - Blue) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(600, 110)">
    <rect width="200" height="100" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="200" height="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">3:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="700" fill="white">RepeatMasker</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Mask genomic repeats</text>
    <text x="100" y="72" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Soft-mask using Dfam</text>
    <line x1="10" y1="82" x2="190" y2="82" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="2 2"/>
    <text x="100" y="95" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#495057">Masked FASTA + GFF + stats</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="100" cy="100" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <circle cx="120" cy="100" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <circle cx="140" cy="100" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  </g>

  <!-- NODE: Consensus Sequences (Output - Orange) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(130, 310)">
    <rect width="140" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="140" height="20" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="16" width="140" height="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="70" y="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white">Consensus Seqs</text>
    <text x="70" y="38" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">Repeat library (FASTA)</text>
    <circle cx="70" cy="0" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- NODE: Seed Alignments (Output - Orange) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(300, 310)">
    <rect width="140" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="140" height="20" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="16" width="140" height="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="70" y="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white">Seed Alignments</text>
    <text x="70" y="38" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">Stockholm format</text>
    <circle cx="70" cy="0" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- NODE: Masked Genome (Output - Orange) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(490, 310)">
    <rect width="140" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="140" height="20" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="16" width="140" height="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="70" y="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white">Masked Genome</text>
    <text x="70" y="38" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">Soft-masked FASTA</text>
    <circle cx="70" cy="0" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- NODE: Repeat Annotation (Output - Orange) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(660, 310)">
    <rect width="110" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="110" height="20" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="16" width="110" height="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="55" y="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white">Annotation</text>
    <text x="55" y="38" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">GFF repeats</text>
    <circle cx="40" cy="0" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- NODE: Repeat Statistics (Output - Orange) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(790, 310)">
    <rect width="110" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="110" height="20" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="16" width="110" height="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="55" y="14" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white">Statistics</text>
    <text x="55" y="38" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">Repeat summary</text>
    <circle cx="50" cy="0" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Legend -->
  <g transform="translate(220, 390)">
    <text x="0" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="#495057">Legend:</text>
    <rect x="60" y="-10" width="14" height="14" rx="2" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <text x="80" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Input</text>
    <line x1="120" y1="-4" x2="160" y2="-4" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <text x="168" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Data flow</text>
    <rect x="240" y="-10" width="14" height="14" rx="2" fill="white" stroke="#f97316" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <text x="260" y="0" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#6c757d">Output</text>
  </g>

</svg>
